description: '''Indonesian heavy metal''' or '''Indonesian metal music''' are music with the [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] genre that developed and emerged from local Indonesian metal bands. In history, the rise of metal music in Indonesia was influenced by the popularity of Indonesian rock music. Several sub-genres of heavy metal in Indonesia are also quite popular, such as [[thrash metal]], [[death metal]], [[power metal]], [[progressive metal]], [[black metal]], and [[gothic metal]] which are often performed by local metal bands in Indonesia.
